title: Sea Turtles
description: Written in a clear, engaging style, Sea Turtles provides details about the physical appearance, nesting patterns, and predators of sea turtles. The author's love for these endangered animals is apparent as she helps us realize that they deserve to live free from hunting and exploitation.
highFrequencyWords: carapace, carnivore, endangered, false crawl, herbivore, omnivore, plastron, prominent, reptiles, rudders, scutes, unique
reviewWords: Use of vocabulary lessons requires a subscription to VocabularyA-Z.com.
comprehension: Capitalization                : Capitalize the names of places
awareness: Compound Words                : Recognize and use compound words
phonics:
Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
